Title: Relates to the use of bicycles for commercial purposes
Summary: Provides that bicycle operators and the businesses affiliated with such operators shall be liable for such operator's failure to carry an identification card or certain other violations regarding the use of a bicycle for commercial purposes; changes violations for the failure to carry an identification card or certain other violation procedures and fines by a commercial bicycle operator.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the use of bicycles for commercial purposes
